column4: 3 days in a row nobody has been able to help me :(, does noone at all know about sound cards?
I'm not sure, I've tweaked around in pulseaudio and alsamixer and nothing seems to be muted.

but in Windows, the sound preferences seems to detect the sub woofer and stereo speakers as two separate devices and I can only run one at a time, I don't mind losing the sub woofer, but I can't even do that on Ubuntu
